description: Sample transformed response from DataForSEO to frontend format

issues.title: 3 Broken Links
issues.description: Broken links hurt user experience and SEO rankings.

issues.title: 2 Broken Resources
issues.description: Images, scripts, or stylesheets failed to load.

issues.title: 1 Duplicate Page Titles
issues.description: Multiple pages share the same title tag, confusing search engines.

issues.title: 2 Duplicate Meta Descriptions
issues.description: Multiple pages have identical meta descriptions.

issues.title: Low Internal Linking
issues.description: Only 8 internal links found. Improve site structure with more internal links.

issues.title: 5 Pages Without Compression
issues.description: Enable gzip/brotli compression to improve load times.

issues.title: 2 Slow Loading Pages
issues.description: Pages take too long to load, hurting user experience.

issues.title: 1 Pages Missing H1 Tag
issues.description: Every page should have exactly one H1 heading.

issues.title: 12 Images Missing Alt Text
issues.description: Alt text improves accessibility and SEO.

transformation_mapping.issues: Built from summary.brokenLinks, duplicateTitle, checks.* → analysis.issues[]
